title: Blueprints overhaul
description: Major blueprints revamp: add descriptions, hide locked ones, auto-spawn tasks/habits/projects on accept, multi-attribute unlock conditions, and many more blueprints across levels.

title: Add description field to blueprints
description: Add description to BlueprintDef and storage. Show in ql status and accept output.

title: Hide locked blueprints from status
description: Only show available/active/completed blueprints in ql status. Hide locked ones.

title: Multi-attribute unlock conditions
description: Support complex unlock rules like 'wis>=5 AND str>=3'. Update Unlock function signature and evaluator.

title: Blueprint auto-spawn children on accept
description: When a project blueprint is accepted, automatically create its child tasks/habits. Fix planning state issue.

title: Add 20+ new blueprints across levels
description: Create rich blueprint library: reading (chapter, moby dick), fitness (push-ups week), culture (theater), household, career, etc. Spread across levels 1-20.

title: Blueprint planning state fix
description: When project blueprint is accepted it stays in planning state with nothing to do. Auto-spawn initial tasks/habits or guide user.

title: TUI major overhaul: retro gaming dashboard
description: Complete TUI redesign: full terminal view, weekly/monthly/yearly graphs, achievements display, easier task/habit/project manipulation, retro gaming + hacker aesthetic.

title: Full terminal view + responsive layout
description: Make TUI use full terminal size with responsive panels. Add proper resize handling.

title: Retro gaming + hacker aesthetic
description: Apply retro gaming theme: phosphor green/amber colors, scanline effects, ASCII art headers, terminal-style fonts/borders.

title: Weekly/monthly/yearly XP graphs
description: Add ASCII bar/spark graphs showing XP earned over time: this week, this month, this year views.

title: Achievements display panel
description: Add achievements/badges panel: level milestones, attribute thresholds, completion streaks, blueprint completions.

title: Task/habit/project manipulation UI
description: Add TUI actions: create task, edit, delete, complete, restore. Use modal dialogs or inline editing.

title: Questline MVP polish: docs + shiny UI
description: Polish pass to make the MVP feel delightful: add a Quickstart + richer docs, upgrade CLI command output formatting, and style the Bubbletea TUI with a consistent theme (colors + emojis), without changing core behavior.

title: Docs: Quickstart + richer README
description: Add a friendly Quickstart flow and expand documentation: build/run, DB path override, command examples with sample outputs, and brief TUI keymap overview.
acceptance_criteria: - README has a Quickstart section with a 5-step first run flow\n- README includes sample command outputs for add/do/list/status/accept/board\n- Notes clarify the legacy Python placeholder

title: CLI polish: themed, emoji-rich outputs
description: Make CLI output delightful and consistent: add a small styling helper (colors/emojis), update add/do/list/status/accept outputs, and make errors pop without changing semantics.
acceptance_criteria: - CLI outputs have consistent headings/icons and readable colors\n- No behavior change: only presentation\n- Errors remain clear and actionable

title: TUI polish: Questline theme + nicer layout
description: Style the Bubbletea board with a cohesive theme using Lipgloss: colored header, highlighted selection, nicer sections, and emoji accents. Keep navigation and behavior identical.
acceptance_criteria:
- ql board renders with consistent colors/styles
- Selected line is clearly highlighted
- UI uses icons/emojis for readability
- No new features beyond styling

title: Difficulty gating by level
description: Gate task difficulty by player level: start with diff=1 only, unlock higher difficulties as player levels up.

title: Implement difficulty unlock gates
description: Gate difficulty by level: L0=diff1, L2=diff2, L5=diff3, L8=diff4, L12=diff5. Enforce in engine create flow.

title: Show difficulty gates in ql status
description: Display unlocked difficulty levels in ql status Gates section.

title: Habits duration & periodicity
description: Enhance habits with duration (1 week, 1 month, N days) and configurable periodicity. Track progress toward habit completion goals.

title: Add habit duration + periodicity fields
description: Add duration (1 week, 1 month, N days) and periodicity to habits schema. Track start/end dates and completion count goals.

title: Habit completion tracking + progress
description: Track habit progress: X of Y completions in duration window. Mark habit as completed when goal reached.

title: CLI flags for habit duration/periodicity
description: Update ql add --habit with --duration and --every flags. Show progress in ql list and ql status.

title: Attributes & XP overhaul
description: Expand attribute system: tasks can award XP to multiple attributes, add new attributes (Household, Outdoors, Reading, Cinema, Career), update XP formulas and storage.

title: Add new attributes to schema + types
description: Add Household, Outdoors, Reading, Cinema, Career attributes to storage schema and engine types. Migrate existing DB.

title: Multi-attribute XP awards for tasks
description: Allow tasks to award XP to multiple attributes with configurable weights. Update CLI flags and storage.

title: Update CLI + TUI for new attributes
description: Update ql add flags, ql status display, and TUI sidebar to show all 9 attributes with icons.

title: Questline MVP (Go CLI/TUI + SQLite)
description: Implement Questline MVP per spec: Go 1.23+, SQLite (~/.questline.db), Cobra CLI, Bubbletea dashboard, RPG XP/levels, gating/unlocks, projects/habits/subtasks, blueprints, and core tests.

title: Bootstrap Go module + repo layout
description: Initialize Go module for Questline (ql), add standard folders (cmd/ql, internal/engine, internal/storage, internal/tui), wire root Cobra command, choose SQLite driver (prefer modernc.org/sqlite), and ensure `go test ./...` runs.
acceptance_criteria:
- `go.mod` exists and `go test ./...` passes
- `ql --help` runs and shows commands scaffold

title: Tests: project completion + habit decay + XP math
description: Add Go unit tests for core rules: project planning/activation/completion/bonus XP, habit decay (>5 completions in 7 days halves XP), and XP/level calculations + unlock boundary checks. Use temp SQLite DB per test.
acceptance_criteria:
- `go test ./...` passes
- Tests cover project completion bonus and PLANNING constraints
- Tests cover habit decay and reset on difficulty increase
- Tests cover XP curve + LevelForTotalXP boundaries

title: Docs: README + install/run instructions for ql
description: Update README to describe Questline MVP (Go + SQLite), how to build/install (`go build` / `go install`), DB location/config overrides, and basic command examples (add/do/list/status/accept/board). Decide what to do with the existing Python placeholder (remove or move to legacy/).
acceptance_criteria:
- README describes Questline (not Organizer) and includes build/run steps
- README documents DB path and override knobs
- README includes example flows for core commands

title: SQLite storage layer (schema + repos + migrations)
description: Implement SQLite persistence: open/create DB at ~/.questline.db (override via env/config), idempotent migrations for player/tasks/blueprints (+ minimal completion history table needed for habit decay), and repositories (PlayerRepo/TaskRepo/BlueprintRepo) with transaction helpers.
acceptance_criteria:
- DB auto-creates with tables on first run
- Repos support: get-or-create player, insert/get/list tasks, mark done, list children, blueprint status changes
- Storage layer has no business logic (only queries/transactions)

title: Engine: XP, levels, attributes, and feature gates
description: Implement core domain math and gating: attributes (STR/INT/WIS/ART, default WIS), XP curve (500*L^1.5), total+attribute levels, task XP formula (difficulty table + attribute-level bonus), and skill-tree gates (max active tasks, subtask depth, habits/projects unlock levels).
acceptance_criteria:
- Deterministic functions for XPRequiredForLevel, LevelForTotalXP, AttributeLevelForXP
- CalculateXP matches spec and freezes xp_value at creation
- Gate checks return clear errors with required levels/limits

title: Engine: create tasks/projects/habits (activation + constraints)
description: Implement create flows in engine using storage repos: create leaf tasks (freeze xp_value), create projects (status=planning, xp_value=0), create habits (interval daily/weekly), enforce max active tasks, enforce subtask depth, and flip project planning→active when first child is added.
acceptance_criteria:
- ql add can create leaf task with correct xp_value + default WIS
- Project creation enforces level >= 7 and starts PLANNING
- Adding first child task flips project to ACTIVE
- Subtask constraints enforced (none < L3; depth 1 until L10)

title: Engine: complete task/project (HP, bonus XP, level-up events)
description: Implement completion use cases: ql do for leaf tasks and projects. Award xp_value to player + attribute XP, recompute derived project HP (sum of uncompleted descendants), block project completion while PLANNING, allow project completion only when all children are done, and grant 10% bonus of total project volume on completion. Emit LevelUp events for blueprint unlock checks.
acceptance_criteria:
- Completing a leaf task marks it done, timestamps it, and awards XP
- Project completion rules enforced (no DONE while PLANNING; must have all descendants done)
- Project bonus XP = 10% of project volume
- Level-up event triggers blueprint evaluation hook

title: Engine: habits (recurrence + diminishing returns)
description: Implement habits: recurring reset (daily/weekly), completion logging, and diminishing returns rule (if completed >5 times in 7 days without difficulty increase, XP reward halves). Editing habit difficulty upward resets decay behavior.
acceptance_criteria:
- Habit completion creates a completion record and resets habit to pending with next due date
- 6th+ completion within 7 days at same difficulty awards 50% XP
- Increasing habit difficulty restores full XP (no decay until threshold again)

title: Blueprints: definitions, unlock checks, and accept command
description: Implement hardcoded blueprints in engine/blueprints.go, persist statuses (locked/available/active/completed), evaluate unlocks on LevelUp events (global + attribute levels), and implement accept flow to instantiate tasks/projects/habits into tasks table. Include MVP blueprints: str_starter, art_reader, art_critic with prerequisites.
acceptance_criteria:
- On level-up, newly available blueprints transition locked→available
- `ql accept <code>` creates the correct entity (habit/project/task)
- art_critic enforces prereq: completed "Read a Book" project

title: CLI (Cobra): add/do/list/status/accept
description: Implement Cobra commands: `ql add`, `ql do`, `ql list` (ASCII tree), `ql status` (player stats + unlocks), `ql accept`. Wire flags per spec (diff/attr/parent/project) and print clear outputs + errors from engine.
acceptance_criteria:
- Commands match spec and validate arguments
- `ql list` prints a stable tree view
- Errors are user-readable (include required level when gated)

title: TUI (Bubbletea): ql board dashboard
description: Implement Bubbletea dashboard `ql board` per spec: header (name/level/xp bar), sidebar (attribute progress bars), main area (focus 1–3 suggested tasks + collapsible quest log tree), footer (last log message). Support basic navigation and completing a selected task.
acceptance_criteria:
- `ql board` launches and renders header/sidebar/main/footer
- Focus view shows 1–3 suggested leaf tasks
- Quest log tree expands/collapses and refreshes from DB
- Can complete selected task and see XP/log update

title: Task restore command
description: Add ql restore command to undo task completions and restore tasks to pending state.

title: Implement ql restore command
description: Add ql restore <id> command to undo task completion: reset status to pending, deduct XP, remove completion record.

title: Docs & community polish (README, license, contributing)
description: Make Questline look cool, modern, and professional: refresh README, expand documentation + usage examples, add LICENSE, and add a clear CONTRIBUTING guide based on bd workflow.

title: README rewrite: modern + pro
description: Rewrite README to feel modern, confident, and developer-friendly: clearer pitch, features, install/quickstart, and links to docs/contributing/license.
acceptance_criteria:
- README has a sharper product pitch + feature list
- README has Quickstart + richer examples
- README links to License + Contributing

title: Add LICENSE (MIT unless specified)
description: Add an explicit open-source license file (default MIT unless user chooses otherwise) and link it from README.
acceptance_criteria:
- Repository contains a standard LICENSE file
- README references the license

title: Add CONTRIBUTING guide (bd workflow)
description: Create a CONTRIBUTING.md with clear development setup, tests, formatting, and the bd-based issue workflow.
acceptance_criteria:
- CONTRIBUTING.md explains local dev, tests, and bd workflow
- Contribution expectations are clear and concise

title: Docs: usage recipes page
description: Add a small docs/USAGE.md with common CLI/TUI recipes and example sessions.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add a docs page with common command recipes
- Keep examples aligned with current CLI output
